text: What we do now echoes in eternity.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
author: Joseph Campbell

text: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

text: When the winds of change blow, some build walls, others build windmills.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

text: The stars incline us; they do not bind us.
author: Ancient Maxim

text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
